SELECT A.RPC_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%M-%D%H%I%S') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%M-%D') AS OPER_DT ,A.RPC_VHC_ID ,B.ROUT_GRP ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.INCDNT_ID ,A.ORG_VHC_ID ,A.ORG_VHC_NO ,A.ORG_DRV_ID ,A.ORG_DRV_NM ,A.RPC_VHC_NO ,A.RPC_DRV_ID ,A.RPC_DRV_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.RPC_DTM, '%Y-%M-%D%H%I%S') AS RPC_DTM ,A.GPS_X ,A.GPS_Y ,A.TM_X ,A.TM_Y ,A.DETAILS ,A.ROUT_ID ,B.INCDNT_TYPE ,RG.DL_CD_NM AS ROUT_GRP_NM ,D.ROUT_NM FROM BMS_RPC_VHC_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_INCDNT_INFO B ON A.OPER_DT = B.OPER_DT AND A.ORG_VHC_ID = B.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO RG ON B.ROUT_GRP = RG.DL_CD AND RG.CO_CD = 'ROUT_GRP' LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST D ON A.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID
AND A.OCR_DTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || RPC_VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.OCR_DTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND RPC_VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY RPC_ID, OCR_DTM
select DATE_FORMAT(OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OCR_DTM, RPC_VHC_ID from BMS_RPC_VHC_INFO
select DATE_FORMAT(OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT, GRP_VHC_ID from BMS_RPC_VHC_INFO

SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,A.DRV_ID ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.GPS_X ,A.GPS_Y ,B.DRV_NM FROM BMS_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_DRV_MST B ON A.DRV_ID = B.DRV_ID
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY A.VHC_ID

SELECT DRV_ID ,DRV_NM ,BUS_DIV ,REMARK FROM BMS_DRV_MST
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY DRV_ID

SELECT VHC_ID ,VHC_NO FROM BMS_VHC_MST
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY VHC_ID

SELECT A.INCDNT_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT ,A.ROUT_GRP ,A.ROUT_GRP_NM ,A.VHC_ID ,A.DRV_ID ,A.INCDNT_TYPE ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_NM ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.VHC_NO ,A.GPS_X ,A.GPS_Y ,B.DRV_NM FROM BMS_INCDNT_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_DRV_MST B ON A.DRV_ID = B.DRV_ID
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY INCDNT_ID DESC
SELECT WAY_DIV FROM BMS_ROUT_MST WHERE ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID}
